articles.title: Nasa's Dart spacecraft 'changed path of asteroid' - BBC
articles.description: Smashing a probe into threatening space rocks is a strategy to defend Earth, an experiment confirms.
articles.content:
The American space agency says its recent attempt to deflect the path of an asteroid was successful.
Scientists have now confirmed the orbit of a 160m-wide (520ft) space rock known as Dimorphos was … [+2869 chars]
